item.title: This drain runs from Monks Lane to a pond next to Fiddington Lane, the drain is blocked which causes flooding on Monks Lane... this has been blocked since winter last year., 30th October

item.title: Branch has fallen in drainage ditch on Lidl side of Finlay Way, 30th October
item.description:
Walk downhill from Lidl entrance and on your left in the ditch is a 25' branch.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Evesham Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Pooling water on pavement, 30th October
item.description:
///epic.puzzle.hang After rain a large pool forms which prevents residents from walking on the pavement. Please see the photographs of an elderly neighbor walking on the road being passed by a cyclist and a car.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 30th October
item.description:
Customer reporting that a vehicle has driven into a signpost at location. Post has been bent ~30 degrees back into the property hedge - no current obstruction of f/way or c/way, Police are dealing with vehicle and driver (vehicle details attached). Customer asking for post to be removed.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)
